Name: A
Description: This issue can be implemented within max. 2 hours

Name: B
Description: This issue can be implemented within max. half a day

Name: C
Description: This issue can be implemented within max. one day

Name: task
Description: technical issue for the developer (no testing needed)

Name: tested & approved
Description: This issue has been tested and meets the requirement

Name: implementation approved
Description: The effort (A/B or C) for the implementation is approved

Name: wontfix
Description: This will not be worked on
